definition: item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: Metro-style applications should be compatible with different hardware and software platforms.
sentences.chinese: 地鐵風格的應用程序應與不同的硬件和軟件平臺兼容。

sentences.english: Next, Sony should rethink its user interface and software platforms.
sentences.chinese: 接下來，索尼應該重新考慮它的用戶界面和軟件平臺。

sentences.english: Symbian is a characteristic example of a software platform.
sentences.chinese: Symbian就是一個軟件平臺的典型例子。

sentences.english: These would be perfectly valid reasons to choose one software platform over another.
sentences.chinese: 對於取捨一個軟件平臺這可能是完全有效的理由。

sentences.english: Screen-capture tools are available for most software platforms.
sentences.chinese: 大多數軟件平臺都可以使用屏幕截圖工具。

sentences.english: The software design of monitor and control system of highway tunnel is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種針對公路隧道監控系統的通用軟件平臺設計。
